page.title: 19Housing in the Hextable area
page.content: The area of Hextable in our D-block is 3 miles from Swanley with all kinds of houses,terraces,cottages and semi-detatched houses.There was a very small thin house with a very thin door as well as pebble dash houses. The private houses have their own style and the occupants can do what they like to them.The people who live in council houses are not allowed to do anything to them,unless they buy them. All the houses and bungalows were made of bricks with tiled roofs.They all had 2 gardens.Some of the flats had balconies,there were 4 blocks of flats all built with bricks. The biggest group were semi-detatched houses built between 1950-1980.The next largest group were bungalows built between 1930-1950 and the 3rd group were detached houses built between 1960 -1980.
